name: Ballistic (itch) (J03)
description:
This is my first game jam  so don't expect anything. I also worked on this project sporadically in the last four days.

Instructions

Avoid rockets at all costs

Left mouse button for turbo, this will consume more fuel.

Every 10 seconds fuel will spawn but be fast, because rockets will destroy the fuel if you're not fast enough

Also every 10 seconds your score goes up by 100,

Assets used

Music by : Nicole Marie T

Buttons by : ankousse26

Water Sprites by : Jason Wild
